RelatedSentence: The son of DSP Aurangzeb Khan , Shahzeb was murdered in DHA after he had an altercation with one of the servants of a powerful and well - connected family .

They eventually handed down death sentences to the main accused , Shahrukh Jatoi and Siraj Talpur , and life terms to Sajjad Talpur and Ghulam Murtaza Lashari .
The more interesting aspect is how after the killing of Shahzeb , the official machinery of the Peoples Party government went into overdrive to save the murderers .
Personal officers of President Zardari and Chief Minister Qaim Ali Shah facilitated the escape of the accused from Pakistan .
It then came as no surprise that soon after Shahzeb 's parents decided to pardon the culprits without claiming the amount of Diyat or Qisas .
